title: Virtual Assistant
job_overview:
Virtual Assistant 

Support for Business & Family Operations

We're looking for a proactive and highly organized Virtual Assistant to support multiple areas of our busy lives. This role will provide remote support for:

Services By Hero (Janitorial Business): handling, reporting, scheduling, customer follow-ups, invoicing, lead generation & social Media.
DDI Design (Interior Design Business): managing project timelines, vendor coordination, billing, and social media updates.
Family & Personal Tasks: organizing calendars, booking appointments, travel planning, and general household coordination.
What We're Looking For:

Excellent communication and time management skills
Proficiency in tools like Google Workspace, Excel, and project management software
Ability to work independently and juggle multiple priorities
Trustworthy, resourceful, and detail-oriented
This is a remote, role with flexible hours. Ideal for someone who thrives in a support role and wants to be part of a family-driven, entrepreneurial environment.

To apply, please send a short note about yourself, your experience, and why you're a great fit.
